sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form class="px-7 mt-3">
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localLogradouro"
            label="Logradouro"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localBairro"
            label="Bairro"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localNumero"
            label="Numero"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localComplemento"
            label="Complemento"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localCep"
            label="Cep"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        
        <auto-complete-field-component 
            Label="Estado" 
            Icon="mdi-database-search" 
            Url="Estado"
            :Data="estado"/>
        <auto-complete-field-component 
            v-model="cidade"
            Label="Cidade" 
            Icon="mdi-database-search" 
            Url="Cidade"
            :Data="cidade" />
        <v-row class="px-3 py-7">
            <v-btn
                outlined
                large
                block
                color="green"
                @click="Salvar()"
                >
                Confirmar
            </v-btn>
        </v-row>
        <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>

import api from '@/services/api';
import AutoCompleteFieldComponent from '../Field/AutoCompleteFieldComponent.vue';
import LoadComponent from '../LoadComponent.vue'

export default {
    components: { LoadComponent, AutoCompleteFieldComponent },

    name: 'CadastroEnderecoComponent',
   
    data: () => ({
        loader: false,
        localLogradouro: '',
        localBairro: '',
        localNumero: '',
        localComplemento: '',
        localCep: '',
        localCidadeId: ''
    }),

    methods: {
        Salvar(){
            this.loader = !this.loader;

            api.put('Endereco', {
                Id: this.enderecoId,
                Logradouro: this.logradouro,
                Bairro: this.bairro,
                Numero: this.numero,
                Complemento: this.complemento,
                Cep: this.cep,
                CidadeId: this.cidadeId
            })
            .then(response => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: true, response: response })
            })
            .catch(error => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: false, response: error })
            })
            .finally(() => (this.loader = !this.loader))
        }
    },
    watch: {
        logradouro(val) {
            debugger
            this.localLogradouro = val
        },
        bairro(val) {
            this.localBairro = val
        },
        numero(val) {
            this.localNumero = val
        },
        complemento(val) {
            this.localComplemento = val
        },
        cep(val) {
            this.localCep = val
        },
        cidadeId(val) {
            this.localCidadeId = val
        }
    },

    props: {
        enderecoId: Number,
        logradouro: String,
        bairro: String,
        numero: String,
        complemento: String,
        cep: String,
        estado: String,
        cidade: String,
        cidadeId: Number
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
